body.name: Clek Fllo Convertible Car Seat, Railroad (Flame-Retardant Free) , 32"D x 17"W x 26"H
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: More ROOM TO FIT 3 ACROSS: The Clek Fllo convertible car seat's compact design provides space that makes 3-across seating possible
Extended rear-facing: the Fllo convertible car seat is designed to international best practices for extended rear-facing use up to 50 pounds, and comes standard with a steel anti-rebound bar.
Maximum side impact protection: engineered with a steel-reinforced substructure, inner and outer energy absorbing foam layers and an adjustable deep headrest.
Energy absorbing Crumple Technology: aluminum honeycomb deformable cores integrated into the car seat base that absorb energy in a collision.
body.description: Clek Fllo is a compact convertible car seat that is complete with industry-leading safety features like extended rear-facing use up to 50 lb., a steel anti-rebound bar and Clek patented Energy-Absorbing Crumple Technology. The Clek Fllo offers Advanced Side Impact protection with deep side wings, energy-absorbing foam layers, and an adjustable structural headrest. At less than 17 inches wide, Fllo conveniently fits 3-across in most vehicles. Made in North America.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Usage Guidelines Rear-Facing Mode: 25-43 in, 14-50 lbs, child able to sit upright alone Forward-Facing Mode: 30-49 in, 22-65 lbs, 2+ years recommended (1 year minimum) Can be used from birth with infant-thingy insert (sold separately) Included in box: Fllo, Anti-Rebound Bar, Manual Accessories available for purchase separately. Drink-thingy, Infant-thingy infant insert, Weelee travel bag, Cleaning Kit, Mat-thingy. Clek Fllo Convertible Car Seat, with LATCH, Anti-Rebound Bar, EACT Crumble Zone Technology and 9-Year Expiration The Compact Convertible Car Seat At less than 17 inches, Fllo makes it easy to ride 3-across. One of the safest narrow car seats available, it’s packed with industry-leading safety features, including a steel anti-rebound bar, Clek’s patented energy management system – and advanced side-impact protection with deep side wings, energy-absorbing foam layers and an adjustable structural headrest. Free of Halogenated Flame Retardants, Because We're Parents Too. Like all Clek Car Seats, all Fllo models are free of brominated and chlorinated flame retardants, while Mammoth and Railroad models are free of any added flame retardants. Fllo is proudly designed, engineered, and made in Canada.

Get The Most Out Of Your Back Seat At less than 17 in wide, Fllo provides space that makes 3-across seating possible in most vehicles. Extended Rear-Facing Designed to international best practices for extended rear-facing, which is to accommodate children in a rear-facing seating position until their 4th birthday. Automotive Inspired EACT Safety Technology The EACT (Energy-Absorbing Crumple Technology) safety technology reduces the forces transmitted to a child in a collision using aluminum honeycomb deformable cores integrated into the seat base.

Integrated Flip Foot Integrated Flip foot for rear-facing installation. Advanced Side-Impact Protection Protects the child in a side-impact collision with its adjustable headrest, deep side wings, inner and outer energy absorbing foam layers, and metal substructure. Steel Anti-Rebound Bar Included for enhanced safety performance, in rear-facing mode, Fllo’s Anti-Rebound bar improves stability by limiting rotation of the child seat, helping protect your child’s head from impact in the case of a collision. It also provides for a snug installation, nesting into the flat portion of the vehicle seat, and offers more legroom for the child. Fabric Options for Every Family Fllo features fabric options that suit your child's personality and match their style (or your car!). Our C-Zero Plus Performance fabrics are GREENGUARD Gold Certified and provide resistance to water-based stains using an innovative fluorine-free formula that’s free of halogenated flame retardants. Mammoth (featuring a blend of Merino wool + TENCEL) and Railroad are flame-retardant free, OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified, and free of PFAS, PFOA, PFC and PFOS chemicals.

Clek car seats are proudly manufactured in Ontario, Canada. Clek is a Canadian based manufacturer of child passenger safety seats that combine safety with ease-of-use and modern style. Born out of a global automotive supplier, Clek offers the superior design, engineering best practices, world-class manufacturing, and craftsmanship found in luxury automotive seating today. We Make Car Seats for Parents Like Us Ride safe. Ride ride. Ride on. Safety: it’s the reason we’re doing this in the first place – to protect the wellbeing of our children and yours. From thoughtful design to impact-reducing materials, all of our baby and toddler car seats and booster car seats are equipped with innovative safety features. Our car seats aren’t just functional. They’re designed to make a statement, because you shouldn’t have to sacrifice style for safety. Made in Canada 9-year expiration Free of Halogonated Flame Retardants Certified for use on an aircraft (FAA certified) Recyclable through Clek's Car Seat Recycling Program Package Dimensions: 31 x 20 17.25 in, 38 lbs Product Dimensions + Weight: 24 x 16.9 x 16 in, 25 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth strap tightening and loosening; safe!
reviews.reviewText: -Pros: Narrow exterior, not too bulky. Solid as a rock. Anti rebound bar for safety. High weight limit for extended rear facing. EASIEST straps to tighten and loosen, compared to my experiences with Britax, Evenflo, and Nuna: glides smoothly, doesn’t get asymmetric.-Neutral: Heavy, which is no big deal, just fyi, while NARROW enough for airplane travel, it’s too heavy to be practical for airplane travel. Lacks the many many subtle angle adjustments of other brands, you just kinda jam it where it looks right, but I’ve found that is not a con, kinda nice to have it a bit simpler. Pretty firm, not as squishy as some brands—my kids like that less claustrophobic feel but yours might prefer marshmallow cocoon seat.Cons: Cupholder accessory (separate) doesn’t attach properly for some users in rear facing position (minor in my view). You have to uninstall, rethread the harness straps, and reinstall as kid grows.If deciding between Fllo and Foonf: sure, the Foonf LATCH of mega power is cool, but as far as I understand it is only for forward facing up to a modest weight limit—so you will never use that LATCH feature if you do extended rear-facing, which is by far the simplest, most powerful choice you can make to ensure toddler / little kid safety. Maybe I’m missing something. But that’s why I chose Fllo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just to clarify this is not the wool material seat. My son likes this seat bc he is up higher than his other seats and can see more. I got this so I can fit three kids across in my honda civic. I think it's gonna work! :)
